data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India.
Father, please give the church in the county of Bhopal prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kayastha Sribastab people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kayastha Sribastab people.
Spirit, please give every church in the county of Bhopal a passion to plant another simple church.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Bhopal, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 2,371,100.

We estimate Bhopal has 26,082 people who might know Jesus, 28,769 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,316,249 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 26,082 believers in Bhopal to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
